title: How much is the salary of a process server in the district courts of Karnataka state? - Quora

response.answer_text: The monthly salary can vary between Rs 10,000 to Rs 50,000 depending upon experience, capability, speed, capacity, term of association, maturity and understanding. It also requires the person to have an excellent rapport with officials to get matters taken up smoothly. One who works only on instructions, with no initiative, will obvioulsy get less salary.
